verses.name: Judges 20:21
verses.text: And the children of Benjamin came forth out of Gibeah, and destroyed down to the ground of the Israelites that day twenty and two thousand men.

verses.name: Judges 20:22
verses.text: And the people the men of Israel encouraged themselves, and set their battle again in array in the place where they put themselves in array the first day.

verses.name: Judges 20:23
verses.text: (And the children of Israel went up and wept before the Lord until even, and asked counsel of the Lord, saying, Shall I go up again to battle against the children of Benjamin my brother? And the Lord said, Go up against him.)
